definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[מוּת]] vb. die (NH id. (rare); As. mâtu Dl:HWB 395, Ar. ma0ta Eth mota:, Aram [[מוּת]], [[מִית]], miyt; Nab. [[מות]] Eut:Nab 14, 6; Zinj. [[מת]] DHM:Sendsch. Gloss.);—
die, of natural or other causes:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (1) of man, †[[וַיִּגְוִע וַיׇּמָת]] and he expired and died Ge 25:8 ( + [[בְּשֵׂיבֶה טוֹבָה]], v. infr.), v:Ge 25:17, Ge 35:29 (P); †[[וַיׇּמָת וַיִּקָּבֵר]] Ju Jdg 10:2, Jdg 10:5, Jdg 8:32, Jdg 12:7, Jdg 12:10, Jdg 12:12, Jdg 12:15, 2Sa 17:23; †[[וימלך תַּחְתָּיו וימת]] and he died and—reigned in his stead Ge 36:33, Ge 36:34, Ge 36:35, Ge 36:36, Ge 36:37, Ge 36:38, Ge 36:39 (P), 2Sa 10:1 = 1Ch 19:1, 2Ki 1:17, 2Ki 8:15, 2Ki 13:24, 1Ch 1:44, 1Ch 1:45, 1Ch 1:46, 1Ch 1:47, 1Ch 1:48, 1Ch 1:49, 1Ch 1:50; [[וימת בְּשֵׂיבָה טוֹבָה]] and he died in a good old age 1Ch 29:28 (+ Ge 25:8, v. supr.); as the result of smiting [[הכה]] Ex 21:18, Ex 21:20, Ex 21:22 (E); + [[במלחמה]] De 20:5, De 20:6, De 20:7, 2Sa 19:11; [[בַּחֶרֶב]] Je 11:22; [[ברעב]] v:Je 11:22; [[מפני הדעב]] Je 38:9; [[בְּדֶבֶר]] Je 21:6; [[באבן]] Nu 35:17, Nu 35:23 (P) ; †[[בַּמַּגֵּפָה]] Nu 14:37, Nu 16:49, Nu 25:9 (P). (2) fig. of wisdom, [[תָּמוּת חָכְמָה עִמָּכֶם]] Job 12:22; of courage, [[וַיׇּמָת לִבּוֹ בְּקִרְבּוֹ]] and his heart died within him 1Sa 25:37.—2Sa 2:31 del. [[מֵָתוּ]] We Dr Kit Bu, cf. LXX.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of animals Le 11:39; cattle Ge 33:13 (J), fish Ex 7:18 (E), frogs Ex 8:9 (J), lion Ec 9:4, worm Is 66:24; [[כֶּלֶב מֵת]], dead dog (in proverb) 1Sa 24:15, 2Sa 9:8, 2Sa 16:9.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: a tree Job 14:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[זִבְחֵי מֵתִים]] Ps 106:28 sacrifices to the dead (idols).
die as a penalty = be put to death:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: by human authority Ge 42:20, Ex 10:28, Ex 21:14 (E), Ge 44:9, Jos 2:14 (J), Le 20:20 (H), Nu 35:12, Nu 35:30, Nu 35:30 (P), esp. D, De 17:2, De 17:6, De 18:20, De 19:12, De 22:22, De 22:25, De 24:7, Ju Jdg 6:30, 1Sa 14:43, 1Sa 14:45, 1Sa 14:45, 1Sa 19:24, Je 38:24; [[מוֹת יׇּמּוּת]], die = be put to a violent death ( > AV RV surely die), 1Sa 14:39, 1Sa 14:44, 1Sa 22:16, 1Ki 2:37, 1Ki 2:42 (all Judaic), Je 26:8, all of capital punishment; 2Ki 8:l0 (Ephr.) cf assassination; [[מוֹת יוּמַת]] be put to a violent death, in the codes of Ex 21:12, Ex 21:15, Ex 21:16, Ex 21:17, Ex 22:18 (E), Le 20:2, Le 20:9, Le 20:10, Le 20:11, Le 20:12, Le 20:13, Le 20:15, Le 20:16, Le 20:27, Le 24:16, Le 24:17 (H), Ex 31:14, Ex 31:15, Nu 15:35, Nu 35:16, Nu 35:17, Nu 35:18, Nu 35:21, Nu 35:31, Le 27:29 (P; never in D; D uses verb, either Qal or Hiph., without inf. abs.); it is used in narratives Ge 26:11 (J), Ex 19:12 (E), Ju Jdg 21:5. ´[[מ]] is preceded by [[רגם]] Nu 15:36 (P), De 21:21, 1Ki 12:18 = 2Ch 10:18, 1Ki 21:13; [[סקל]] De 13:11, De 17:5, De 22:21, De 22:24, 1Ki 21:10, 1Ki 21:13, 1Ki 21:14, 1Ki 21:15; [[פגע]] 1Ki 2:25, 1Ki 2:46; [[רמס]] 2Ki 7:17, 2Ki 7:20; [[בְּיַד גּׁאֵל]] Jos 20:9 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: die, perish, of a nation by divine judgment, Moab Am 2:2, Ephraim Ho 13:1; [[בית ישׂראל]] Ez Eze 18:31, Eze 33:1.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: die prematurely, by neglect of wise moral conduct Pr 5:23, Pr 10:21, Pr 15:10, Pr 19:16, Pr 23:13, Ec 7:17.—Note. On ([[לַבֵּן]]) [[עַל־מוּת]] Ps 9:1, Ps 48:14 v. [[עַלְמָה]] sub II. [[עלם]].

definitions.title: Po‘lel.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[מוֹתְתַנִי]] Je 20:17; 1 S. [[מׂתַתִּי]] 2Sa 1:16; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְמׂתְתֵהוּ]] 1Sa 17:51; 3 fs. [[תְּמוֹתֵת]] Ps 34:22; 1 S. sf. [[אֲמׂתְתֵהוּ]] 2Sa 1:10; Imv. sf. [[מוֹתְתֵנִי]] Ju Jdg 9:54; [[מׂתְתֵנִי]] 2Sa 1:9; inf. [[מוֹתֵת]] Ps 109:16; Pt. [[מְמוֹתֵת]] 1Sa 14:13; —kill, put to death, despetch (intens.), abs. 1Sa 14:13, elsewhere c. acc. Ju Jdg 9:54, 1Sa 17:51, 2Sa 1:9, 2Sa 1:10, 2Sa 1:16, Je 20:17, Ps 34:22, Ps 109:16.
abs. Job 9:23, elsewhere c. acc., subj. man,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of killing men in personal combat, or in war, often preceded by [[הבּה]] smite Jos 10:26, Jos 11:17, 17:50 +; of destroying a city 2Sa 20:19 (‖[[השׁחית]] v:2Sa 20:20).

subj. God, by inflicting penalty, abs. De 32:39, 1Sa 2:6, 2Ki 5:7, elsewh. c. acc. Ge 18:25, Ge 38:7, Ge 38:10, Ex 4:24, Nu 14:15 (J), De 9:28, Ju Jdg 13:23, 1Sa 2:25, 1Sa 5:10, 1Sa 5:11, 1Ch 2:3, 1Ch 10:14, Is 65:15, Ho 9:16; [[ברעב]] Is 14:30; [[בחמא]] Ho 2:5; of killing fish Ps 105:29; [[מְמִיתִים]] Job 33:22 executioners, angels of death.
of animals killing men, e.g. ox Ex 21:29 (E), lion 1Ki 13:24, 1Ki 13:26, 2Ki 17:26.
bring to a premature death Pr 19:18, Pr 21:25.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוּמָָת]] 2Ki 11:2 +; 3 mpl. [[הֻמְתוּ]] 2Sa 21:9; Impf. [[יוּמַת]] Le 20:10 +; [[יוּמָָת]] Ge 26:11 +; Pt. [[מוּמָת]] 1Sa 19:11, pl. [[מוּמָתִים]] 2Ki 11:2 (Qr), 2Ch 22:11; —be killed, put to death:
by divine infliction, in the phrase [[מות יוּמת]] (see
die prematurely Pr 19:16.
